Quote: Ah, Azalea,"said the King. "He's not going to be the one proposing."The springs in Azalea's feet went poioioing."Sorry?"she said."You outrank him, you know."The King shifted, uncomfortable. "It would be highly inappropriate for him to propose to you. The Delchastrian queen had to propose-""I will do no such thing!"said Azalea.
Author: Heather Dixon,  Entwined
